characters: Driver of a white sedan, other drivers in various vehicles
summary: The video shows a white sedan driving on a multi-lane road in urban setting. The weather appears to be overcast.  The road is relatively clear with other vehicles maintaining a safe distance. The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and distance from the car directly in front. No sudden appearances of vehicles or pedestrians are observed. Traffic flow is moderate.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and following distance throughout the 10-second segment.  The vehicle stays in its lane and does not make any lane changes or turns. The consistent speed and following distance suggest the driver is maintaining a safe and cautious driving style, adapting to the moderate traffic flow.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, a person on an electric bicycle wearing a red hard hat and yellow-brown work clothes.
summary: The video shows a white sedan driving on a city road.  A person on an electric bicycle, wearing a red hard hat and yellow-brown work clothes, is visible in the right lane, initially behind a partially obscured area. The cyclist then becomes fully visible and continues to ride in the right lane, maintaining a safe distance from the self-driving vehicle. No immediate danger is observed.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position throughout the observed segment.  There are no observable changes in speed or direction. The vehicle appears to be following the flow of traffic.
key_objects: Right: Person on an electric bicycle, approximately 15 meters away at the start of the segment, moving parallel to the self-driving vehicle in the adjacent lane, maintaining a safe distance.
